item.title: Flying by the seat of our pants - our journey of teaching python using drones
item.description:
Description

A few years ago we found ourselves teaching students everything from Python to Arduino. It was our plan to replace all the other languages with Python as we streamlined our course. Learn why we introduced drones, what we learned not to do and what we were surprised about.

https://2019.pycon-au.org/talks/flying-by-the-seat-of-our-pants--our-journey-of-teaching-python-using-drones

Fri Aug 2 10:30:00 2019 at C3.4 & C3.5
item.dc:creator: Kylie Mathers
